headline: Cadence Enables Next-Gen AI and HPC Systems with Industry’s Fastest HBM4 12.8Gbps IP Memory System Solution
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., April 17, 2025--Cadence's HBM4 12.8Gbps memory IP solution meets the high memory bandwidth needs of SoCs targeting next-gen AI training and HPC hardware systems.

raw.headline: Cadence Enables Next-Gen AI and HPC Systems with Industry’s Fastest HBM4 12.8Gbps IP Memory System Solution
raw.summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., April 17, 2025--Cadence's HBM4 12.8Gbps memory IP solution meets the high memory bandwidth needs of SoCs targeting next-gen AI training and HPC hardware systems.

headline: Buy This Market-Crushing Tech Stock Down 20% for Huge AI Upside
summary: AI tech stock Cadence is holding its ground at some key technical levels, and it might be ready to break out of a holding pattern if its first quarter 2025 earnings results and guidance impress on Monday, April 28.

raw.headline: Buy This Market-Crushing Tech Stock Down 20% for Huge AI Upside

headline: Cadence to Acquire Arm's Artisan IP Business to Boost IP Portfolio
summary: CDNS will acquire Arm's Artisan IP to boost its IP portfolio with advanced standard cells, memory compilers, GPIOs and embedded security from Secure-IC.

raw.headline: Cadence to Acquire Arm's Artisan IP Business to Boost IP Portfolio
raw.summary: CDNS will acquire Arm's Artisan IP to boost its IP portfolio with advanced standard cells, memory compilers, GPIOs and embedded security from Secure-IC.
